title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Engineering Design Studio: Project-Based Approach for Cognitive Growth

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and simple design processes
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically record and analyze at least three instances of epistemic changes occurring during scientific problem-solving processes through engineering design projects.
Learners improve design prototypes at least twice using peer feedback in a studio-based collaborative environment.
Learners implement expert-level thinking processes at least 70% by applying the Cognitive Apprenticeship Model (modeling, coaching, scaffolding) during project execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
